item.description:
=====

Read the entire description before you RSVP and answer all questions that are part of the RSVP. Failure to answer them will result in your removal from this event. If you RSVP from a mobile device the questions may not show up - use a computer to update your RSVP so you can answer them.

Your safety, and the safety of the group, is the most important thing. If you underestimate the demands of this event; overestimate your experience, knowledge, skills or abilities; or come unprepared you put yourself and others at risk – consider this before you decide to participate.

=====

Trip Description

This Sunday we're hiking to Mt. Cabot along the Bunnel Notch trail. The distance is 10 Miles with a book time of 7.5 Hours. The summit is wooded and views are minimal so this trip is more for peak baggers working on their 4k list.

Gear

  • Rain Gear
  • Water/food
  • Map/compass

Parking

Parking is at the end of York Pond Road in Berlin, past the fish hatchery. Here's a map: map.

Weather

I'll check the weather the day before and cancel Saturday morning if conditions look bad.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Boone the yellow Lab with a blue pack.
item.name: Mt. Cabot peak bagging trip.
